thread.title: SPViewer 3.0 is here, with support for Microsoft Project 2016
thread.title_full: SPViewer 3.0 is here, with support for Microsoft Project 2016

author: prbuzz.com
title: SPViewer 3.0 is here, with support for Microsoft Project 2016
text:
Malmö, Sweden (September, 2015) - Seavus, the producer of globally-known software for viewing Microsoft Project files, has announced the latest version of its project viewer for iOS, SPViewer 3.0, which supports .mpp files created in Microsoft Project 2016 and professional graphical reports as in MS Project 2013.
News of the upcoming release of Microsoft Project 2016 has proved to be great motivation for the Seavus Products R&D team to investigate and implement the support for Microsoft Project 2016 Admin Preview, the pre-release to MS Project 2016 and be on track with their Project Viewer for iOS. With SPViewer 3.0, iOS users have the exclusivity to open, view, analyse and print Microsoft project files prepared in any MS Project version, including MS Project 2016.
In addition, with SPViewer 3.0 users can create and customize professional graphical reports that will provide critical project status information and ensure team members are up-to-date with the project progress. The Project reports included in the Dashboards category provide instant visualization of project progress including cost overview, project overview, work overview and upcoming tasks report templates. The Resources report category provides an instant graphical representation of the resources assigned to a certain project, actual work, baseline work and remaining work to be done, by providing useful input when resources reassignment is necessary. The Costs category provides time-saving benefits to project managers and finance responsible with task cost overview, resource cost overview and cost overruns reports.
Moreover, iOS users can now easily share .mpp files or project reports via AirDrop, simplifying the process of sharing critical project information and determine project success.
SPViewer 3.0 is available from iTunes at the following link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/spviewer-viewer-for-.mpp-files/id905938217?mt=8
About the company:
Seavus® is a software development and consulting company with a proven track-record in providing successful enterprise-wide business solutions. The company has over 600 IT experts worldwide and offers a variety of products and service options, successfully covering the European and US market from several offices across the world. Their expanding portfolio covers: BSS/OSS, CRM, CEM, Business Intelligence Solutions, ALM, embedded programming, business and consumer software products, mobile and gaming solutions, managed services, as well as custom development, consultancy and resourcing. The Seavus portfolio includes over 3,500 customers, including leading worldwide telecoms and handset manufacturers, organizations from banking and finance sectors, consumer electronics, technology, education, government, health, etc.
Products Sales & Marketing, Seavus Group
